title: Gandalf, The Grey Pilgrim (2P122)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Companion • Wizard
Strength:	7
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Aragorn
Game Text:	At the start of each of your turns, you may draw a card.
Lore:	”'When evening in the Shire was grey / his footsteps on the Hill were heard; / before the dawn he went away / on journey long without a word.'”
Rarity:	P
